subject: Football
organizations: Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University
lead_paragraph: BLACKSBURG, Va., Sept. 1 (AP) — They came throughout the day — some bearing flowers, others wiping away tears. They moved slowly on the gently curving path in front of Burruss Hall, pausing to look at the names engraved on 32 distinctive chunks of what is called Hokie Stone.
